attributes.action: Prioritise veterans and vet widows after discharge on social housing lists.
attributes.additional_details: These people fought for Queen and Country. Many struggling with fitting into civilian life. They need acknowledgement and respect for their services.
attributes.background: After a veteran is discharged. They must be given priority on every social housing register.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Fund guaranteed housing for armed forces veterans
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585941
